mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_QUESTION (writer_no, cs_type, title, content) VALUES (#{writerNo}, #{csType}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (original_name, saved_name, type_code, target_no) VALUES (#{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{typeCode}, LAST_INSERT_ID())
mapper.select: SELECT cq.cs_no, cq.writer_no, t.type_name AS csName, cq.title, cq.content, cq.created_at FROM CS_QUESTION cq JOIN TYPE t ON cq.cs_type = t.type_code WHERE cq.cs_no = #{csNo}
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE type_code = "CS" AND target_no = #{csNo}
SELECT *, m.nickname FROM CS_ANSWER ca JOIN Member m ON ca.answerer_no = m.member_no WHERE cs_no = #{csNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS_ANSWER (cs_no, answerer_no, content) VALUES (#{csNo}, #{answererNo}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT created_at FROM CS_ANSWER WHERE answer_no = LAST_INSERT_ID()
SELECT is_answered FROM CS_QUESTION WHERE cs_no = ${csNo}
